_sText:
This is my first Knife Arena map. It is a soccer map that takes place into the streets of a city. 
The field is properly sized with "Throw-in" areas.

- There are ambient sounds and sounds from ka_soccer_2006_v2
- The ball is made with a custom texture
- Skybox Texture by komaokc
This is Lolobubu's pitch and ball (edited by Toph) in a new stadium by me.
This map is based on Lolobubu's ka_soccer_2006 map.

ka_soccer_rainyday_v1

Features:

  • Gameplay adjustment after latest css updates (phys_pushscale fix)
  • New ball Model!
  • Simple for competitive games!
  • Environment: rainy jungle
  • Mini Map Radar

Just extract the file to

C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps

You can play this map without any plugins for soccer (I don't even know if they work).

I wanted to make my first map of futbol and i decided to make the stadium of my city
because it was a bit easy XD

Do not worry about your life because you have got 10010 hp and it is a bit difficult that the
enemies kill you but if your team get a goal, the enemies will die instantaneously.
I added a part of the song "Carnival de Paris" at the beginning of the round but not always because
it can become bitter.
The map has got models made by !PosTi85 so there is not lag.
I wish you HF and see this map at your server ^^.

Thanks to the creator of ka_soccer_2006_v2.

(I do not know why the web side delated my map and the bullfight_el_puerto).

_sText:
**_Please report any bugs encountered._**

**_UPDATED - Version 3 released_**

There are 3 games, Stanga and Cube and Bounce
In the Stanga you can practice 1vs1 or 2vs2 using built in options.
In the Cube and Bounce you can practice solo or with a friend, playing 2 different games. 
You can also spectate your friends playing.

**_Stanga Notes:_**
The **GOAL** is self activated. The **RAMP** must be first unlocked, and then each one has to trigger it to the other. The **NET** must be triggered by both sides. The **RESET** button must be triggered by both sides.

**_Cube Notes_:**
The **GREEN** button will activate an aiming game. The **BLUE** button will activate a counter for ball bouncing. The **WHITE** button will reset the ball. The **BLACK** button will open the window. The **RED** button will open the exit door.

**_Bounce Notes:_**
There are 2 games, in each one you have to bounce the ball to progress.

**_General Notes:_**
*Don't suicide, please use God mode in your servers because the ball can    and probably will kill you. If it does, it might bug the field you were in.
*Don't use Noclip, because it will bug the map.

**_I hope you enjoy the map!_**
Map not made entirely by me, just fixed.

This was really a private map for a competition our soccer league is doing, But I thought I'd post it to get some opinions on the concept, to see whether it's worth making into a public map. You fight to the death inside a small cage, using only a ball. You'll probably need to have played one of the other ka_soccer maps to understand how to kill with the ball. 2 random ct players are picked to vs 2 randomly picked terrorist players. The rest wait outside the cage (and can knife the cage etc. to put pressure on) When 1 player inside the cage dies, a trap door opens up beneath him and he falls down into a pit of spikes. Another player from his team who isn't dead (waiting outside the cage) is then brought in. (so it's like a tag team). This continues until 1 whole team is out. Notes: There is much to add to this map, and i know some of the textures are ugly. It also hasn't been compiled for lighting so the bottom of the cage has blotches of transparency. It looked much better with lighting (see screenshot 3), but once i added the spike pit it took > 24 hours to compile. This map must be installed with the scripts, and you need mani + eventscripts + es_tools to install the scripts. Originally you only died once you hit the spikes, but people complained about the death after being hit not being as real. Although the trapdoor idea may seem similar to ka_mixeur_2008_v3, that is purely by coincidence since i hadn't seen that map till after making this. The ball is from lolobubu's soccer map though.

Hey Guys, this is my new Soccer Map. The Soccer Field Size is the same like the Maps from lolobubu. The Map is full functionality for 32 Players. There are Custom Sounds and Custom Textures are in the Pack. The Soccer Ball Prop from Forlix is in the Pack too. The Location is the Olympic Stadium from Berlin. Hertha BSC Berlin is the Home Team from this Stadium. I hope you like it. If someone put this Map on his Server, plz tell me that, i like to play my Map with you. The Texture Problem with the Carpet at the Pokal Stand and the Team Banks are Fixed.

Have Fun

Our skillor

Ka_soccer_badweather _______________________ Mod of ka_soccer_2006_v2 September 2008 by Forlix http://www.forlix.org email df@forlix.org Original map by LOLOBUBU http://laurentbubu.free.fr Improvements: - Ball now implemented as a 200-face geo-sphere mesh model - Better rolling behavior due to symmetric face distribution Please give credit and tell me when using it in another map. Flat trigger-zones above the bars trigger the "zonk" sound. (Sound that was played when people lost on a German game-show "Geh aufs Ganze" in the 90s) Map is supposed to reflect the typical northern Germany weather, maybe a little exaggerated. - I hope the severity of the weather will not repel players! There is fog, rain, rain sound, and some big puddles. Map is in the cycle on my server: Forlix pure! (funmaps + soccer, fastDL) - 92.51.140.185:27015
well... first map of soccer, anything that you want to say to me, just say it, i know, my english its very shitii, but well, hope you like it.
Credit to LolobuBU FOR BALL AND GRASS
ka_soccer_acssl_betafinal2
This map is a fix of the best soccer map ever.

This is an updated version version of the map ka_soccer_2008_indoor_beta1. It now has a scoreboard and radar, a gap where you can get on the outside of the nets (and walk back in anywhere, although i'm thinking of changing that), And the change rooms / toilet rooms have been made hollow and filled with toilets and seats etc. It's also been optimized, you should get better fps than the previous version or fletch's original. For those that haven't seen the older version of this, you can jump into the nets and spring back, like with real indoor nets. There's still a fair bit to be done on this map, but this is a step forward.

An updated version of the ka_soccer_2009_beta1 map. Fixed bugs, added vvis for better lighting and much much less lag, Added sideline booths, added a TV, made it overall better looking. There are still some smaller known problems, but since I haven't had time to work on it, I'm releasing it as-is. Commands: Type these commands in chat to perform certain actions with the autoref script. !ref -- Brings up a referee menu to control manual aspects of the ref script. you must be set as an admin in the autoref config for !ref and !setteams.
!setteams [team1here] [team2here] -- Set teams for the ref script. Use underscores for spaces. For the newer scoreboards since 2008_v6, use full-stops to center the team.
!score -- For users to show scores and period info. In addition to the map and map customizing scripts, you can optionally install my soccer (gameplay) scripts, available here: http://addons.eventscripts.com/addons/view/soccer They work for every setting different league/clans use. Extremely customisable. they record personal player stats (viewable in-game and on a webserver), Limit knives-per-minute, Disable knifing, Control health/god-mode options (including a commbox-as-bloodbin script), Automatically referee (for clan/league matches), Control an in-game scoreboard on a special map, Slay people jumping on goals, Set separate skins for goalies and teams, And automatically load the scripts upon changing to a soccer map.

This is an early preview of the new soccer map worked on by me and mr bubbles. I've had this version for about a month and haven't been able to really add anything to it, so I'll release what's done so far. There's a sleek looking stadium with moving crowds, and working scoreboards on both sides of the field. A 'ball cam' moves around the stadium. There are floodlights around the stadium that, as soon as i work out a way to do it without creating lag, will turn on at night time. I'm working on a script to make this map change the skybox, field lights, and darkness to simulate night and day. (this script is not included as it's very buggy atm) There is still much to do in this map. some things are a bit ugly.. but most of the functionality is there. It's a bit dark because there is a problem stopping it from compiling in vvis. As with my v4 and v5 maps you can customize alot of the textures and settings manually or using the included MapEdit program. Very similar to the previous map, ka_soccer_2008_v5: http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/57381 What's new is that the scoreboard now shows periods, the teams on the scoreboard use a-z characters so you no longer have to make separate textures and set skins for teams. And Hadoken from ACSSL has made a radar overview for the map. Very similar to the previous map, ka_soccer_2008_v4: http://www.fpsbanana.com/maps/53757 Only with that map, the scripts i included that control parts of the map were bugged, It is fixed in this version. What's new is that there is a scoreboard, which is controlled by a ref script that displays the time left in the period, scores, and teams. You can set up to 12 teams on the scoreboard (only 8 team logos in the tunnels). You'll need to edit the custom textures and set the teams in the autoref.cfg to do that. You may have seen a customized version of this map on australian or american servers. I've decided to make a universal version available to everyone instead of continuing to have to make changes to the map for the different international leagues. The main improvements are that I've fixed the v3 goal glitch at the back of the nets, and made realistic textures for the ball, grass, goals, and flags. I've added other things like billboards, stopping people entering the crowds, team logos etc.. but they are all optional. You control what parts of the map you want and don't want, and you can chose your own country flags on both sides of the map. To do this you have to edit the \cstrike\cfg\soccermap.cfg file. I've also made a program (Mapedit.exe) for those that can't edit the config file. It will also allow you to change the textures easily. You must have eventscripts and mani admin plugin installed on your server for this map to work. It is fairly heavily designed around the scripts, by default the map won't look good. If you can auto-load the 'soccermap' script another way you don't need mani. In addition to the map and map customizing scripts, you can optionally install my soccer (gameplay) scripts, available here: http://addons.eventscripts.com/addons/view/soccer They work for every setting different league/clans use. Extremely customisable. they record personal player stats (viewable in-game and on a webserver), Limit knives-per-minute, Disable knifing, Control health/god-mode options (including a commbox-as-bloodbin script), Automatically referee (for clan/league matches), Control an in-game scoreboard on a special map, Slay people jumping on goals, Set separate skins for goalies and teams, And automatically load the scripts upon changing to a soccer map.

It's not much yet.. I've really only just started.. but I wanna get an idea of what people think of the nets.

This is an edit of fletch's indoor map (with his permission).. so far basically what i've changed is:
No crowds, there's things like restrooms and vending machines instead (not complete yet), New soccer nets,
Changed a few other textures, the outer stadium is now made of white bricks (dunno if that's weird but that's how it is at my sports center).
And new green nets around the stadium, which, when you jump into them will spring and throw you back in like most indoor nets do.
They work both ways too, so if you noclip yourself to the other side and walk into them you'll get pushed onto the field.
(could maybe make a script where the first round the player plays on the map, they have to walk through the nets to get on, for added realism)


The nets have white bits around them which make them go white unless you're looking really close at them, which looks pretty ugly.. hoping to fix that in the next beta.


Unlike most of my other soccer maps, you can't customize any settings or textures, it's just a simple copy the map on and run it.

Hi all

i make this map + MOD soccer_2006 v2.1
-> testing = 82.232.212.159:27015

> Put this lines in your others maps .cfg

phys_pushscale 1

> in folder ( >.../cstrike / cfg / mani_admin_plugin / map_config / name_map.cfg )

http://laurentbubu.free.fr

- i remove sound ( Out ball )
- i add new sounds = Goal + start  ^^
- i remove bug stadium ...
- Use the "Mattie EventScript" for make a script Anti-Kill !

Changes made since V2

  • Changed sunlight so that no shadow is cast over the pitch. Sunlight is now directly down. (Midday).
  • Changed "Matt_" credit from "func_physbox" to "func_detail" to stop it being brought onto the pitch.
  • Made pitch flat for the ball. Ball no longer gets effected by the pitch line paint. The lines are now "func_illusionary" entities and are non-solid to the player and the ball.
  • Fixed goal glitch where when used on some soccer mods, a goal could be scored by hitting the ball onto the top of the net.
  • Added "ka_" prefix to map name in order for the map to be more easily found in the server browser.

Thnx to .:|GGA|:. Clan for testing the map for bugs, glitches, and needed fixes. Inspired by Lolobubu's ka_soccer_2006
Enjoy!

A knife arena in a glass sky scraper with 4 glass floors and 1 as a last backup. When you fall you die. There are 2 He grenades of which 1 is on the highest floor and one on the lowest. the gravity is lowered to make you able to jump to a higher floor.

This is the first, and original mario map, which I had made a few months ago, and shown to the public.

The map recreates the first stage from Super Mario Bros. on the NES, hence the '1_1' in the name.

It had a few bugs, which I have now finally ironed out after leaving the map at the back of the shelf for a while.

Thanks for taking my idea guys!

My first map need help or isthere some problems pm me!

Map instructions:
-There is xm1014 in centre of the map. It has loads of ammo, so grab it if you can and dont try to lock yourself in corner or such!
-Platforms break when you jump _off_ them.
-Every platform breaks after 2 minutes from round start.
-You regenerate health with the time.

Have fun! :D
 Other notes: 
map is designed for small servers. I can extend it up to 64 ppl if you want(write feedback) but i'm not not sure...
No HDR.
No easter eggs this time! :S
Map is still wip!
